servicioOfrececonjunto: What we offer for residential complexes

serviciosBeneficio.title: Security
serviciosBeneficio.text: Enjoy a system designed to give you peace of mind. With tools that ensure more efficient access control and transparent communication with management, your community will always be protected.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Communication
serviciosBeneficio.text: Stay informed at all times. Receive notifications, announcements, and important messages directly on your device, avoiding misunderstandings and improving your relationship with neighbors.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Community
serviciosBeneficio.text: Strengthen bonds between neighbors with tools that foster collaboration and a sense of belonging. The app helps create a more united and participatory environment.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Vacation rental
serviciosBeneficio.text: Find ideal properties for your holidays or list yours with confidence. Our system ensures both owners and tenants have a safe and transparent experience.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Rent or sell
serviciosBeneficio.text: List your property in minutes and reach more people interested in buying or renting. The platform allows you to showcase your property without complications.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Virtual Intercom
serviciosBeneficio.text: Receive calls from the front desk directly on WhatsApp, without the need for physical intercoms. A modern solution that makes visitor entry easier and improves communication with management.

serviciosBeneficio.title: User management
serviciosBeneficio.text: Register up to four sub-users per unit, providing personalized access for family members or tenants. Each user can interact according to their role in the community.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Announcements and notices
serviciosBeneficio.text: Don‚Äôt miss any important updates. All management announcements arrive in real time in the app so you‚Äôre always aware of what‚Äôs happening in your community.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Activities
serviciosBeneficio.text: Organize and participate in community events or activities in an organized way. From meetings to social gatherings, everything is centralized in one place.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Visitor registration
serviciosBeneficio.text: Easily and quickly control who enters your community. Digital records replace manual processes and enhance community security.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Resident registration
serviciosBeneficio.text: Keep the residents database updated. This module lets you know exactly who lives in each unit, making management and security easier.

serviciosBeneficio.title: News page
serviciosBeneficio.text: Access all the news and updates about your community in one place. Clear and accessible information always at your fingertips.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Marketplace
serviciosBeneficio.text: Buy and sell products or services within your community. A simple way to support local entrepreneurs and meet needs without leaving the community.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Portfolio control
serviciosBeneficio.text: Manage community finances with an integrated portfolio control. Generate clear reports, handle payments, and maintain transparency in resource usage.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Discussion forum
serviciosBeneficio.text: Join debates and share ideas with your neighbors. An open space where everyone can give opinions and suggest improvements for the community.

serviciosBeneficio.title: Document management
serviciosBeneficio.text: View, organize, and store important documents such as minutes, regulations, or reports. Everything is digitized and accessible at any time.

faqs.question: Why does the price vary so much between plans?
faqs.answer: Because each plan includes different features and benefits tailored to the size and needs of each community.

faqs.question: Is the price per complex, per tower, or per apartment?
faqs.answer: The price is calculated per complex, and within each plan the estimated cost per property is detailed.

faqs.question: Are there discounts if I pay annually instead of monthly?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for annual payments. Contact us to learn about current promotions.

faqs.question: Is the 'Total per property' value mandatory or only if I use that function?
faqs.answer: That value is just a reference of the cost per property; it‚Äôs not charged individually to each resident.

faqs.question: Can I start with one plan and then switch to another?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can start with one plan and upgrade to another anytime according to your needs.

faqs.question: In the Basic plan, does the virtual intercom work the same as in the others?
faqs.answer: Yes, the virtual intercom is available in all plans, although in Gold and Platinum it integrates with WhatsApp.

faqs.question: Are visitor and resident records updated in real time?
faqs.answer: Yes, all information is recorded and synchronized in real time.

faqs.question: Does the Portfolio Control in the Platinum plan replace the accounting software or just complement it?
faqs.answer: It can complement, not replace it, depending on how your accounting is currently managed.

faqs.question: What‚Äôs the difference between 'Notices and announcements' and the 'News page'?
faqs.answer: Notices and announcements are direct messages to residents, while the news page is for general information.

faqs.question: In vacation rentals, can I publish more properties by paying extra if I‚Äôm on the Gold plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can increase the number of available properties by paying an additional cost.

faqs.question: Do administrators need training?
faqs.answer: No, the app is intuitive, but we offer free training if needed.

faqs.question: Does the app work on any phone or only Android/iOS?
faqs.answer: It works on Android, iOS, and also from a web browser.

faqs.question: Can it integrate with security cameras, or is it only manual recording?
faqs.answer: By default, it‚Äôs manual recording, but we offer custom integrations with camera systems.

faqs.question: Is there a limit to how many residents can be registered?
faqs.answer: No, you can register as many residents as you need.

faqs.question: What happens to the data if I stop paying for the service?
faqs.answer: Your data is kept for a period so you can reactivate the service without losing information.

faqs.question: How do you protect residents‚Äô and visitors‚Äô information?
faqs.answer: We use secure cloud servers, data encryption, and certified security protocols.

faqs.question: Is technical support available 24/7 or only during business hours?
faqs.answer: Basic support is during business hours, while higher plans offer extended support.

faqs.question: Where is the data stored?
faqs.answer: On cloud servers with international security standards.

faqs.question: Can I try the platform for free before paying?
faqs.answer: No, we do not offer a free trial.

faqs.question: Can I pay only for certain modules?
faqs.answer: No, modules are included depending on the plan, but you can choose the one that best fits your needs.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit card, debit, PSE, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: Does the price include VAT?
faqs.answer: Yes, all published prices include VAT.

faqs.question: What happens if I fall behind on payment?
faqs.answer: You‚Äôll have a grace period, and afterward, access will be suspended until payment is updated.

faqs.question: Can the modules be customized with our logo or colors?
faqs.answer: Yes, the app allows customization of your brand image and institutional colors.

faqs.question: Can I create different roles besides subusers?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have admin, security guard, and resident roles.

faqs.question: Can I enable or disable features as needed?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can enable only what you need.

faqs.question: Can I increase the number of properties if my community grows?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can request extensions by paying an additional fee.

faqs.question: Can it connect with access control?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer integration with compatible hardware.

faqs.question: Does the intercom work with landlines or mobile phones?
faqs.answer: It works with mobile phones via WhatsApp or VoIP calls.

faqs.question: Can push notifications be sent?
faqs.answer: Yes, via app, email, and WhatsApp.

faqs.question: Do residents need to download the app?
faqs.answer: Yes, available on iOS, Android, and web.

faqs.question: Does the security guard need constant internet access?
faqs.answer: Yes, although if the connection is lost, data is saved and synced later.

faqs.question: Can it be used in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: By default, it‚Äôs in Spanish, but English can be enabled if required.

faqs.question: How many devices can use the same account?
faqs.answer: Each user can have the app on up to 2 devices simultaneously.

faqs.question: How easy is it to migrate data from another system?
faqs.answer: Very easy, we help you import your current data.

faqs.question: What support is included in the plans?
faqs.answer: Online support in all plans, and priority phone support in Gold and Platinum.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
faqs.answer: No, you can cancel anytime without penalty.

faqs.question: Do updates have an additional cost?
faqs.answer: No, all updates are included in your plan.

faqs.question: Do you have a compliance policy?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guarantee service continuity and security.

faqs.question: What real difference will I notice between the Basic and Gold plans?
faqs.answer: The Gold plan offers more users, announcements, and marketplace options, improving interaction and management.

faqs.question: Is the Platinum plan worth it if my community is small?
faqs.answer: Platinum is usually for larger communities. If yours is small, you can start with Basic or Gold.

faqs.question: Which other communities are already using it?
faqs.answer: We work with communities in various cities and can share success stories.

faqs.question: What savings can be achieved using the app?
faqs.answer: Reduced administrative costs, time savings in recordkeeping, and better communication with residents.
